review: This little unit works great. It's quick to respond and the remote isn't infrared so you don't need to point it at the unit to get it to work. It has a lot of apps and options to choose from so there's always something you can watch. It remembers where you were last it you want to stop in the middle of a tv episode and come back later. Just wish that it would adjust if your internet speed should slow down for any reason instead of buffering for a long time.
author: Sherry L

review: Setup was a breeze (just do what it tells you to do). Picture quality was excellent. Apps load quickly. And the voice search feature - it really works!! Just say "The Good Wife," and it finds all the seasons, so you select the season you want and then select the episode you want. I especially like the fact that when you find the show you want, if you are a member of Amazon Prime it shows "Purchase with Amazon Prime" (i.e., $0.00) as one of your options (provided that the show is available on Amazon Prime), so there is no need to go looking for the show you want on Amazon Prime (although you can do that too). Also, the Home menu lists "recent" shows you watched, so you can go directly back to them, and it "remembers" which episode you watched last and goes directly to the next episode. We are using it primarily to watch certain TV shows, movies, and "Watch ESPN." I have watched several basketball games on "Watch ESPN," and video and audio equals what I get on cable. I have Google Chrome on another TV and Vizio TV on another TV, but this is far better.
